General.Name: Wanda Cinema Line Corp
General.Description: Wanda Film Holding Co., Ltd. engages in the investment, construction, and operation of movie theaters in China, Australia, and New Zealand. It is also involved in the movie distribution, movie screening, and related derivatives businesses. The company was formerly known as Wanda Cinema Line Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Wanda Film Holding Co., Ltd. in May 2017. Wanda Film Holding Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is based in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

3.Name: Mr. Huiwu  Wang
3.Title: VP, Sec. of the Board & Director
